author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

In response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35036#issuecomment-1079718341, follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37308.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles, also run `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -j 8 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: get rid of more UB in `TrackListMerger`
